mapper.sql: t.maintenance_id, t.equipment_id, t.part_id, t.part_quantity, t.reason, t.content, t.maintain_user_id, t.maintain_time, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag,
t.location_id, t.warehouse_id, t.number, t.comments, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,
t.part_id, t.category_id, t.name, t.spec, t.model, t.unit, t.brand, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,
t.inventory_id, t.warehouse_id, t.location_id, t.part_id, t.quantity, t.in_task_date, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,

t.sensor_data_id, t.equipment_id, t.sensor_id, t.string_value, t.number_value, t.boolean_value, t.longitude_value, t.latitude_value, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,

s.sensor_id, s.equipment_model_property_id, s.function_code, s.address, s.data_format, s.bit_order, s.period, s.quantity, s.write_number, s.grm_action, s.grm_variable, s.grm_variable_value, s.osh, s.osl, s.ish, s.isl, s.create_user_id, s.create_time, s.update_user_id, s.update_time, s.delete_flag, s.company_id,
mapper.select:
select a.alarm_id, a.alarm_type, a.upper_Bound, a.lower_Bound, a.duration, a.alarm_target, a.equipment_model_property_id, a.create_user_id, a.create_time, a.update_user_id, a.update_time, a.delete_flag, a.company_id from eam_alarm a, eam_sensor s WHERE s.equipment_model_property_id = a.equipment_model_property_id AND a.delete_flag = 0 AND s.delete_flag = 0
AND s.sensor_id = #{sensorId}

select a.alarm_id, a.alarm_type, a.upper_Bound, a.lower_Bound, a.duration, a.alarm_target, a.equipment_model_property_id, a.create_user_id, a.create_time, a.update_user_id, a.update_time, a.delete_flag, a.company_id from eam_alarm a left join eam_equipment_model_properties p on a.equipment_model_property_id = p.equipment_model_property_id left join eam_equipment_model m on m.equipment_model_id = p.equipment_model_id left join eam_equipment e on e.equipment_model_id = m.equipment_model_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 and p.delete_flag = 0 and m.delete_flag = 0 and e.delete_flag = 0 and e.equipment_id = #{deviceId}
mapper.sql: t.id, t.alarm_id, t.equipment_id, t.equipment_model_property_id, t.alarm_value, t.alarm_status, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,

t.id, t.alarm_id, t.equipment_id, t.equipment_model_property_id, t.alarm_value, t.alarm_status, t.alarm_clear_value, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,

t.equipment_id, t.equipment_model_id, t.equipment_category_id, t.name, t.number, t.serial_number, t.image_path, t.longitude, t.latitude, t.province, t.city, t.user, t.collect_status, t.heart_data, t.grm, t.grm_password, t.grm_period, t.factory_date, t.commissioning_date, t.warranty_start_date, t.warranty_end_date, t.maintenance_period, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.is_online, t.modbus_rtu_period, t.salve_id

p.equipment_model_property_id, p.equipment_model_id, p.name, p.label, p.unit, p.address, p.data_type, p.display_type, p.refresh_period, p.create_user_id, p.create_time, p.update_user_id, p.update_time, p.delete_flag, p.company_id,
mapper.select:
select count(p.equipment_model_property_id) from eam_equipment_model_properties p left join eam_sensor s on s.equipment_model_property_id = p.equipment_model_property_id left join eam_equipment e on e.equipment_model_id = p.equipment_model_id left join eam_sensor_write_data d on d.equipment_model_property_id = p.equipment_model_property_id AND d.equipment_id = e.equipment_id AND d.delete_flag = 0 WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 AND p.delete_flag = 0 AND e.delete_flag = 0 and e.equipment_id = #{equipmentId}
AND (p.name like #{pattern} or p.label like #{pattern} )

select u.username, u.realname, ar.reject_commont, ar.create_time from eam_ticket_appointed_record ar, upms_user u where ar.order_taker_id = u.user_id and ar.ticket_id =#{ticketId, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ar.create_time desc
select status, count(ticket_id) as count from eam_ticket where delete_flag=0 and company_id=#{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} group by status

select a.plan_id, work_content, next_maintain_date, maintain_frequency_unit, maintain_frequency_quantity, maintain_type, remind_time, a.create_time , ec.name as equipmentCategoryName, e.name as equipmentName, group_concat(uu.realname) AS maintainUsers from eam_maintain_plan a LEFT OUTER JOIN eam_equipment_category ec ON a.equipment_category_id = ec.equipment_category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN eam_equipment e ON a.equipment_id = e.equipment_id LEFT OUTER JOIN eam_maintain_user mu ON a.plan_id = mu.plan_id LEFT OUTER JOIN upms_user uu ON mu.user_id = uu.user_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 and mu.delete_flag = 0 and a.plan_id=#{planId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select IFNULL(is_online,0) as type, count(eq.equipment_id) as num from eam_equipment eq, eam_equipment_company c where eq.equipment_id = c.equipment_id and c.delete_flag=0 and c.company_id=#{ticketId, jdbcType=INTEGER} group by type
